description:
Even though he's never "come out," it's pretty obvious that Jurek likes dick. He likes sucking it and he likes it up his ass.
"I'm blowing him today," Jurek said, pointing at Scott, who was standing beside him.
"I'm the one with the anaconda," Scott joked. "Girls call it the beast."
Of course, Jurek's eyes got wide and he laughed.
"I'm pretty picky too," Scott said, almost as a non sequitur. "That's why it's a good thing that you're cute!"
Wow, OK, we're pretty all over the scale here today!
"A gay friend told me that I need to experiment," Scott added. "Can't knock it 'til you try it."
I think Jurek was a little surprised too. But I could tell that he just wanted to see the 'anaconda.'
Scott continued: "It's like guys know what you want a lot better than girls. And girls usually have small mouths so they can't really handle it."
I don't think I've ever heard a straight guy give so many reasons as to why it's a good idea to get head from another guy, but heck!
Finally, the big cock came out and faster than the speed of sound Jurek had it in his mouth!
title: Blowing Scott
